text:
My 94 year old grandma got the #COVID19 #vaccine. She's lived through:
✔️Cholera (1920s)
✔️ Smallpox (1970s)
✔️ Polio (1980s)
✔️ Bubonic Plague (1990s)
✔️ Swine Flu (2000s)
Her immigrant frontline pharmacist daughter also got it today. Vaccines, masks, & distancing all work. https://t.co/5BP07wGiKv
